title: The Best Sangria Ever
directions: Combine wine, lemon slices, orange slices, sugar and rum into a pitcher. Muddle with the back of a large spoon to get the fruit to release some of its juice, and to dissolve the sugar. Put into the fridge. Just before serving, stir in club soda. Serve over ice and fruit.
ingredients: 1 bottle merlot (could use cabernet or zinfandel)
2 cups Club Soda or Ginger Ale if you want it sweeter
Other fruit: strawberries, blueberries, kiwi, peaches, raspberries
